channel.title: [Hyperion] RuneFocus - 2006 Re-vival
channel.description:
[img]http://runefocus.netau.net/Images/header.png[/img]
As a lot of you know, I'm a old school fanatic, and I love everything OLD about RuneScape, since I started playing RS as a kid.. I had already one attempt for a RuneScape re-make and it was going quite good - [b]xEpicz[/b][i]. [/i]One of my project was called RuneFocus too, but that one was released. And since [b]RuneFocus[/b] is the most sexy name I ever gave to a server, I've decided to keep it. Well, this time, the project is going to be based on Hyperion. Since I want to improve my knowledge, I've choosed a superior source, and I love the way it's documentated and I love the way it's handled. I'm using the Canownueasy's iServer, since it had already combat so it spares me some pretty good time. [b]No, I didn't quit with Osiris 194, it's my side project. Docent took the work in his hands for some time.[/b] I would need 1/2 developers, so if any1s interested, please send me a PM.
The server is going to be based on the 2006. The protocol is #317, and I'll to make out of it my best. It won't be a total remake, it will have all skills, a couple of city's finished and some quests/minigames. I love to work on the content, so that won't be a problem I guess :)
I started to work on the weapons, so by now most of the weapons has the right GFX/Animations, including the specials and stuff. The first skill I've started to work on is Agility, so for now here will be my Agility goal list. I will keep updating my goal list with progress, for now I'm stuck on agility.
[size=4]Agility:[/size]
[ul][li]Gnome Agility Course[/li] [li]Barbarian outpost course[/li] [li]Brimhaven Agility arena[/li] [li]Wilderness Agility course[/li] [li]Gaining tickets[/li] [li]Rewards[/li][/ul]
Media(Pictures):
[img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/31784lh.jpg[/img]
For now, only 2 of us are working on this project.
[ul][li]I Roll Deep (Diego)[/li] [li]Twins (Shony)[/li][/ul]
[b]I need 1-2 more persons that are willing to work with me on this project, so feel free to send me a message.[/b]

EDIT: Started to work on the runecrafting base, this is how it looks so far:

Docent:

Gl man

Thanks brah.
added fillables, I’m expecting to add item on objext handling tomorrow, some improvements on the gnome course(agility), and a fresh start on runecrafting.

[/quote]

No, I didn’t quit with Osiris 194, it’s my side project. Docent took the work in his hands for some time.

:).

OT: Looks interesting, I wish you luck. :P[/quote]Hey Tiny! Haven’t seen you for a while on here Thanks bro, I’ll need it. I fell in love with Hyperion so yeah this is going to be fun
